Class BoardMemento

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.model.BoardMemento
public final class BoardMemento extends Object
Represents a snapshot of the game state at a specific point in time.

Design Pattern: Memento
This class acts as the Memento in the pattern. It stores the internal state of the game (the grid, score, and level) so that the GameHistory (Caretaker) can save it and the GameController (Originator) can restore it later.

Immutability: This class is immutable. The constructor performs a deep copy of the board matrix to ensure that subsequent changes to the active game board do not corrupt the saved history states.

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardMemento

      public BoardMemento(int[][] board, int score, int level)
      Creates a new Memento containing a deep copy of the current game state.
      Parameters:
      board - the source 2D array representing the grid (values are copied, not referenced).
      score - the current score at the time of saving.
      level - the current level at the time of saving.

  • Method Details

    • getBoardState

      public int[][] getBoardState()
      Retrieves a safe copy of the saved board matrix.
      Returns:
      a new 2D integer array containing the grid state. Modifying this return value will not affect the stored memento.

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Retrieves the score saved in this snapshot.
      Returns:
      the score integer.

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      Retrieves the level saved in this snapshot.
      Returns:
      the level integer.
